block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Leonard Stein of Huntington Station, L.I., have announced August wedding plans for their daughter, Cara Ann Stein, and Barry David Rosenfeld, a son of Elizabeth Rocklin of Washington and Stuart Rosenfeld of Durham, N.C. Ms. Stein, 28 years old, is a television talent scout for the William Morris Agency in New York. She graduated from Grinnell College. Mr. Rosenfeld, 30, graduated from Boston University and is a doctoral candidate in clinical psychology at the University of Virginia.
